name: Veggie Hunter
description:
Introducing "Veggie Hunter"! In this thrilling game, players take on the role of a farmer who must tend to their crops during the day and defend them from pests at night. Using the WASD keys, players navigate the farm and use the number keys 1, 2, and 3 to select actions such as tilling the soil, planting seeds, and using a trusty shotgun to harvest the veggies at night. The action is brought to life with the use of the mouse click, allowing players to fully immerse themselves in the farming experience. Days will pass, and players must keep growing their crops and harvesting them in the darkness. With challenging gameplay and a unique concept, "Veggie Hunter" is sure to provide hours of entertainment for players of all skill levels.

Movement: WASD

Mouse Click to perform selected action

Select action:

  1. Till,
  2. Seeds
  3. Shotgun
